mapper.update:
update tr_supplier_db_manage
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobilePhone = #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
orgid = #{orgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
islock = #{islock,jdbcType=TINYINT},
isvalid = #{isvalid,jdbcType=TINYINT},
logincount = #{logincount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
last_logintime = #{lastLogintime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modifytime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tr_system_user set ncid = #{ncid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, identityTypes = #{identityTypes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobilePhone = #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orgid = #{orgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, islock = #{islock,jdbcType=TINYINT}, isvalid = #{isvalid,jdbcType=TINYINT}, logincount = #{logincount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, last_logintime = #{lastLogintime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modifytime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from tr_system_user
and name like CONCAT('%', #{nameLike,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
order by createtime desc limit 0,20

select
from tr_system_user where orgid = #{orgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and isvalid = 1 order by createtime desc
mapper.insert:
insert into tr_system_user ( id, ncid, code, name, account, password, identityTypes, mobilePhone, orgid, source, islock, isvalid, creator, createtime, utc ) values
(#{item.id}, #{item.ncid}, #{item.code}, #{item.name}, #{item.account}, #{item.password}, #{item.identityTypes}, #{item.mobilePhone}, #{item.orgid}, #{item.source}, #{item.islock}, #{item.isvalid}, #{item.creator}, #{item.createtime}, #{item.utc} )
mapper.select:
select
from tr_supplier_db_manage where islock = 0 and isvalid = 1 and id = #{ncid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from tr_supplier_db_manage where (code = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or mobilePhone = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

and code like CONCAT('%',#{codeLike,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and code like CONCAT('%',#{accountLike,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and name like CONCAT('%',#{nameLike,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
